item.title: Rules of Home Intelligence
item.description: There are a lot of things one can automate around the home, but that doesn’t mean you need to do it. I want to make sure that the technology that I install isn’t intrusive and makes things easier. Therefore I have created the following rules for my smart home. No feature should require constant babysitting, it should just work. No feature should make a task harder than it currently is.
